price: 61.Moominiiney yahuud munaafiqhiin siinil tamaate waqdi neemeneh siinik iyyan, usun Nummah lubbittet koroosannu luk siinil culeeniih Nummah usun sin garik kaa luk yewqen, Yalli usun koroosannuu kee munaafiqhannuk Qellisak Sugeenim Yaaxigeh usun iimaan yaybulleen way.
arabic: وَإِذَا جَآءُوكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَقَد دَّخَلُواْ بِٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَهُمۡ قَدۡ خَرَجُواْ بِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā jāūkum qālū āmannā waqad dakhalū bil-kuf'ri wahum qad kharajū bihi wal-lahu aʿlamu bimā kānū yaktumūna
